meanings.sent1: The key pertains to the locked door.
meanings.sent2: The discussion pertains to the upcoming project.
meanings.sent3: His joke about the banana peel pertains to slipping on it.
meanings.sent4: Her advice pertains to navigating through difficult situations like a compass.
meanings.sent5: The label on the box pertains to its contents.

meanings.definition: Be appropriate or relevant to something.
meanings.sent1: Wearing a swimsuit pertains to swimming at the beach.
meanings.sent2: His comments pertained to the topic of the meeting.
meanings.sent3: The cat's meow pertains to wanting attention.
meanings.sent4: Her smile pertains to a ray of sunshine on a cloudy day.
meanings.sent5: The warning sign pertains to safety precautions in the area.
